name: New Mario Kart: Double Dash!!
overview: There is a new way to play Mario Kart: Double Dash!! Grab your Wii Wheel or your traditional controls and have fun with Mario Kart tracks: Double Dash!! in the style of Mario Kart Wii game. And battle mode? You can fight in 10 new stages of retro battles, and the classic tracks of the Wii. Tired of playing alone? You can play with 4 local players, or jump to 12 players through the Wiimmfi connection! Just set your console's connection and start having fun! No more configuration needed!
